title: (x) Fleetwood Mac "Rumours" - Letterhead Fonts/Nick Curtis {Mike Y}
content:
Needed for a client who likes it. The font doesn't have to match the typeface (as I believe it was a custom creation), just something similar. I think it's some kind of Nouveau face, but I can't find anything that even resembles it. Can anyone help?   
   
 ![Fleetwood Mac - Rumours typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201828im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/40694.jpg)
author: Down10

comments.content: Looks similar to things that you might find at [Nick Curtis's site](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201828/http:/www.nicksfonts.com/) or [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150122201828/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/).
Man, I didn't remember this lettering being so poorly done--especially the RUMOURS part.
